name: Sacred Grounds (Center for the Advancement of the Humanities through Cultural Diversity
overview:
Non-profit coffee shop that invites all ethnicities, disabled, seniors and adults to present, perform, learn or teach their art, religion, cultural customs and traditions and alternative medicine.

Provides community awareness of cultural diversity, networks artists to perform together or work simultaneously on projects, and teaches tolerance for all ethnic groups.

We not only serve coffee but sell sandwiches, salads and soups.

We will offer an acoustically sound environment for musicians, poetry readings, a stage for theatre, and forums for lectures, workshops, seminars and classes.
